metadata.title: CVE-2024-3976 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 14.0 prior to 16.9.7, starting from 16.10 prior to 16.10.5,and starting from 16.11 prior to 16.11.2. It was possible to disclose viathe UI the confidential issues title and description from a public projectto unauthorised instance users.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
